actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to transfer administrative consideration of applications for Federal recognition of an Indian tribe to an independent commission, and for other purposes.
short_title: Indian Federal Recognition Administrative Procedures Act of 1994
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Indian Federal Recognition Administrative Procedures Act of 1994 - Establishes the Commission on Indian Recognition, which shall determine tribal recognition petitions. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to publish an annual list of recognized Indian tribes. Authorizes appropriations for the Commission and the Administration for Native Americans of the Department of Health and Human Services.

titles.title: Indian Federal Recognition Administrative Procedures Act of 1994
A bill to transfer administrative consideration of applications for Federal recognition of an Indian tribe to an independent commission, and for other purposes.
